text: is there any way to make more unicode available in Makie? I mean, when I tab complete e.g. \itE then I get a symbol in julia, but an empty box in the plot…

elements.text: is there any way to make more unicode available in Makie? I mean, when I tab complete e.g. \itE then I get a symbol in julia, but an empty box in the plot…

text: Depends only on the font you use. Dejavu has a lot, but not everything. We don't currently have a better fallback font than that I think

elements.text: Depends only on the font you use. Dejavu has a lot, but not everything. We don't currently have a better fallback font than that I think

text: Yeah you should be able to switch the font! If you find one that is able to represent more, let me know

elements.text: Yeah you should be able to switch the font! If you find one that is able to represent more, let me know
